altername_name: Dark Wizard: Yomigaerishi Yami no Madoushi
Dark Wizard: Yomigaeri Shiyami no Madoushi
name: Dark Wizard
overview: You take on the role of one of four playable main characters and must re-conquer the land that has already fallen into Velonese's hands and find a way to defeat him and prevent Arliman's resurrection. The four main characters feature largely different stories, however, every game begins with the King's death and your character becoming the new ruler of Cheshire.
